Looking forward to hearing from you!
Best regards,Stephanie

body_text:
Hi,
I've finished reviewing the authentication module you pushed on 53 days before current date. Overall, the implementation looks solid!
I have a few suggestions:

Consider adding rate limiting to the login endpoint
The password validation could be stricter
Add unit tests for the edge cases we discussed

The deadline is 47 days before current date, so we have some time to iterate. Let me know if you want to pair program on any of these changes.
Great work!
Thomas
